parameters:
Receptionist Piste: This used to be the transfer room for
the trial version, but from now on it will become a room for
performing version upgrades and such.

Receptionist Piste: If you want to perform a version
upgrade, please save your progress here.

Receptionist Piste: Alright, I will now automatically open
the save screen. If you don't need to perform a version
upgrade or anything, you can just close it as it is.

\CL Here, you can play the Adult Scene on Failure for
quests that have already been cleared within the quests
where sneak missions occur.
\CL It seems that there are no cleared quests.

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene on failure for the
quest Spider in Disarray?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene on failure for the
quest Whereabouts of the Emma Thieves?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene on failure for the
quest Treasure of the Orcs?

\CL Here, you can play the Adult Scene on Failure for
quests that have already been cleared within the quests
where sneak missions occur.
\CL It seems that there are no cleared quests.

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest Spider in
Disarray?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest The Whereabouts of
the Emma Thieves?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest Treasure of the
Orcs?

\CL Here, you can play adult scenes that occur during
certain quests that have already been cleared.

\CL It seems that there are no cleared quests that correspond
to this.

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs in the
quest Prince of the Sun?
\CL These are all the quests that can be confirmed.

\CL Here, you can play the Adult Scene on Failure for
quests that have already been cleared within the quests
where sneak missions occur.
\CL It seems that there are no cleared quests.

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest Spider in
Disarray?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest The Whereabouts of
the Emma Thieves?

\CL Would you like to play the adult scene that occurs when
you fail the sneak mission in the quest Treasure of the
Orcs?

\CL When you select Yes, the save screen will open and
restore the party members to their normal state. \C[14] *I
apologize for the inconvenience, but I recommend saving
separately just to be safe.
